name: Squishy The Squid
description:
A game about a squid named squishy.

The project was for prototyping mobile controls in a 2d game and for trying my hand at 2d tilemap generation so the level is procedurally generated.

Tap arrows to move in bursts, the goal is to find the red coin and other gold 'Sand Castle Coins' along the way while avoiding Urchins.

The prototype currently has no end-game or save system so finding the coins means nothing.
